monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Creates a rock obstacle - Activates ground switches
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: This Monster's Max Health and Mana are increased by 12% each.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Whenever this Monster applies a Debuff to an enemy, 35% chance to spread that Debuff to another enemy.

skills.name: Acid Rain
skills.description: 3 x 55% (165%) magical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Rain Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 50% (200%) magical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Rain Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 65% (260%) magical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Rain Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) magical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Rain Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) magical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Tempest
skills.description: 1 x 155% magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Tempest Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 95% (190%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Tempest Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 125% (250%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Aging
skills.description: At the end of its turn, this Monster gains an Age stack.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Bolster
skills.description: Healing actions apply two random Buffs to the target. (Multi-Target-Heals apply one random Buff to each target)

skills.name: Center of Mass
skills.description: Multi-Target-Attacks deal 30% extra damage to the enemy with the highest Health. Multi-Target-Heals heal the ally with the lowest Health by 30% more.

skills.name: Combo Healing
skills.description: Healing actions trigger an additional Heal on the Monster with the lowest Health equal to 30% of Magic value.

skills.name: Curse Chain
skills.description: Whenever this Monster applies a Debuff to an enemy, 35% chance to spread that Debuff to another enemy.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Demotivate
skills.description: Unique Aura: Weakness (Debuff) reduces enemies' healing and shielding by 20%.

skills.name: Earth Resistance
skills.description: Earth damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Elemental Break
skills.description: Unique Aura: Armor Break (Debuff) increases enemies' weaknesses by an additional 10% and decreases their resistances by 10%.

skills.name: Eternal Heart
skills.description: This Monster's Max Health and Mana are increased by 12% each.

skills.name: Fire Weakness
skills.description: Fire damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Force of Nature
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies - Heal all allies for (750 + 120% Magic)

skills.name: Gift of Life
skills.description: Revives all allies Heal all for 3 x (400 + 50% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Mastery
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) are increased by 20%.

skills.name: Health Focus
skills.description: Health values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Health Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 5% of Max Health.

skills.name: Heroic Party
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party deals 1% increased damage for each Buff on it.

skills.name: Hexing Support
skills.description: Whenever this Monster spends a turn without attacking an enemy, apply a random Debuff on a random enemy.

skills.name: Leaf Slash
skills.description: 3 x 50% (150%) physical damage (earth) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Leaf Slash Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 50% (200%) physical damage (earth) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Leaf Slash Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) physical damage (earth) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Leaf Slash Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) physical damage (earth) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Leaf Slash Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) physical damage (earth) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Life Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Life Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Life Wave
skills.description: Heal all for (300 + 7.5% Max Health)

skills.name: Life Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (250 + 5% Max Health)

skills.name: Life Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (500 + 6% Max Health)

skills.name: Lifechannel
skills.description: Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party Applies Channel (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Lifechannel Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party Applies Channel (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Lifechannel Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Regeneration & Channel (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Mana Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Multi Regeneration
skills.description: Aura: Regeneration (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Multi Weakness
skills.description: Aura: Weakness (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Nature's Wrath
skills.description: Aura: All Nature Monsters in the party deal 15% more damage.

skills.name: Regeneration
skills.description: Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Remunerate
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, 60% chance to gain Regeneration (Buff).

skills.name: Restoration
skills.description: Unique Aura: Regeneration (Buff) also has a 50% chance to remove a Debuff at the start of the turn.

skills.name: Revive
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 5 x (50 + 15% Magic)

skills.name: Revive Lvl 2
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 6 x (75 + 15% Magic)

skills.name: Revive Lvl 3
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 6 x (125 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Shared Regeneration
skills.description: Whenever this Monster gains Regeneration (Buff), another random Monster in the party also gains Regeneration.

skills.name: Soul Beam
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (earth) applies Regeneration (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Soul Beam Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 95% (380%) magical damage (earth) applies Regeneration (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Soul Beam Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) magical damage (earth) applies Regeneration (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Static
skills.description: Non-critical hits deal 20% more damage.

skills.name: Sustained Heal
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (500 + 30% Magic + 3% Max Health) Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Warlock Healing
skills.description: For every heal applied there is a 10% chance to apply Poison, Weakness or Armor Break on a random enemy.

skills.name: Weaken
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Weakness.

skills.name: Weakening Crush
skills.description: Every physical attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Weakness.
